name: goodreads_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Goodreads in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('table.tableList tr, .searchResults tr, [itemtype*="Book"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.bookTitle, [itemprop="name"] a'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('a.authorName, [itemprop="author"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('.minirating, .greyText, [class*="rating"]'); if (titleEl) { results.push({ title: titleEl.textContent?.trim() || '', url: titleEl.href || '', author: authorEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', rating: ratingEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } } }); const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
detailSteps.label: Extract
